channel.title: Entries on ArMD
channel.description: Recent content in Entries on ArMD

item.title: Backup org files in github
item.description: NOWT=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d %T") git add . git commit -m "$NOWTAutomated git push" git push Code Snippet 1: backup_files_to_github.sh */15 * * * * cd ~/org && ./backup_files_to_github.sh >> ~/cron_log.log 2>&1 Code Snippet 2: crontab entry Checkout log rotation to avoid growth of cron_log.log I used the snippets here to backup my org files, however it can be used for any file. The cron-job invokes backup_files_to_github.
